sentences.en: Bring ingredients to a boil in a large saucepan. Let cool . Refrigerate.
sentences.cn: 在汁锅中放入以上配料,加热至煮沸. 冷却,入冰箱冷藏.

sentences.en: Cover and refrigerate overnight or at least for several hours.
sentences.cn: 用东西盖住碗,然后把它放在冰箱里整晚或至少几个小时.

sentences.en: Cover with plastic film and refrigerate for 24 hours.
Place on a cookie tray and refrigerate until firm.
sentences.cn: 最后把所有的巧克力糖一层层垒到蜡纸上,密封放进冰箱里.

sentences.en: Please refrigerate for a few hours before serving.
sentences.cn: 请将成品放到冰箱冷藏几个小时再食用.

sentences.en: Refrigerate after opening . Use within 2 - 3 days after opening.
sentences.cn: 开瓶后冰箱冷藏,并于2-3天内吃完.

sentences.en: Refrigerate beef fillings for about 20 min.
sentences.cn: 拌好的牛肉馅料置入冰箱冷藏约20分钟.

sentences.en: Storage a cool , dry, dark place. Do not refrigerate.
sentences.cn: 储藏:阴凉干燥处, 不能冷藏.

sentences.en: The freezing machine cannot refrigerate any more. it needs to be repaired.
sentences.cn: 这台冷冻机已经不制冷了,需要拿去修理.

sentences.en: They are trying to repair a breakdown in the refrigerate system.
sentences.cn: 他们正在全力抢修发生故障的冷却系统.

sentences.en: We jelly the pudding by putting it into refrigerate.
sentences.cn: 我们放布丁在冰箱里使其结冻.

sentences.en: Wrap plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 2 hours.
sentences.cn: 用保鲜膜包好,放冰箱至少冷藏2小时.

sentences.en: You had better refrigerate the beer before drinking it.
sentences.cn: 喝啤酒前你最好先把它冷冻一下.
